channel.title: Hamachi problem
channel.description:
okay umm first off when i went on hamachi it synchronised for like about 4mins...(normally 20 secs at most)
and now i cant get rid of all my existing networks and its taking ages for everyones name to light up with the green online signal....i think it might be lagging but im not sure..when i press leave network nothing happens
and now its reconnecting and everyones name is yellow dot beside it... i have like 6-7 different networks does that have anything to do with it?
please help it would be greatly appreciated[br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 05:12:14 PM[/size][hr]actually make that 13 networks
